docs.title: assess_essay async
docs.text:
Assess the essay

route: /assessment/assess_essay/ method: POST auth: API Key as bearer token in the header

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default essay_request EssayGradingRequest

The essay to assess

required

Returns:

Name Type Description EssayAnalysis EssayAnalysis

The assessment of the essay

docs.title: assess_grammar async
docs.text:
Assess the grammar in the text

route: /assessment/assess_grammar/ method: POST auth: API Key as bearer token in the header

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default text TextInput

The text to assess

required

Returns:

Name Type Description GrammarAnalysis GrammarAnalysis

The assessment of the grammar in the text

docs.title: assess_pronunciation async
docs.text:
Assess the pronunciation in the audio input

route: /assessment/assess_pronunciation/ method: POST auth: API Key as bearer token in the header

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default audio_input AudioTextInput

The audio input to assess

required

Returns:

Name Type Description PronunciationAnalysis PronunciationAnalysis

The assessment of the pronunciation in the audio input

docs.title: assess_speech async
docs.text:
Assess the speech in the audio input

route: /assessment/assess_speech/ method: POST auth: API Key as bearer token in the header

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default audio_input AudioTextInput

The audio input to assess

required

Returns:

Name Type Description SpeechAssessmentOutput SpeechAssessmentOutput

The assessment of the speech in the audio input

docs.title: text_similarity async
docs.text:
Assess the similarity between the query and the references

route: /assessment/assess_text_similarity/ method: POST auth: API Key as bearer token in the header

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default input SimilarityCheckInput

The input to assess

required

Returns:

Name Type Description SimilarityOutput SimilarityOutput

The similarity scores between the query and the references

docs.title: transcribe async
docs.text:
Transcribe the audio input

route: /assessment/transcribe/ method: POST auth: API Key as bearer token in the header

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default audio_input AudioInput

The audio input to transcribe

required

Returns:

Name Type Description TextOutput TextOutput

The transcription of the audio input

male (str): male female (str): female

docs.text:

docs.text:

docs.title: AnswerType
docs.text:
Answer type for the assessment

TEXT (str): Answer is a string AUDIO (str): Answer is an audio link

docs.title: AssessmentRequest
docs.text:
Request for assessment

Attributes:

Name Type Description question Question

Question asked

answer str

Answer to the question

answer_type AnswerType

Type of answer

source AudioSource

Source of the answer

performance_summary str

Summary of the performance

answer_duration_seconds int

Duration of the answer in seconds

docs.title: AudioSource
docs.text:
Source of the answer

LINK (str): Answer is a link FILE (str): Answer is a file
